page.title: 18Church attitudes
page.content: The monthly Anglican Church magazine also has news items for Methodists; they support one another by joint fund raising & by sharing occasional Sunday evening services. All 3 denominations are welcome at the Harvest Supper held in the Community Hall each autumn.At Wootton a{prayer group}meets regularly swelled by others during the Lenten period. Lent was marked by a women's group preparing a weekly lunch of soup & bread to raise money for the victims of the{Ethiopian drought.}The congreg- ation is being asked to consider the effects of the{Sunday Trading Bill}and to voice their opinions at the Deanery Synod. Everyone squeezed into Trinity Methodist Church Abingdon for the Deanery Eucharist as it was too wet to hold it in Albert Park. Wootton people found the hymns unfamiliar & the arm- waving of some Evangelicals alarming.
